name: Chilmole | Spicy Black Soup
description: The Chilmole or Relleno negro is a dish of Yucatecan cuisine, based on turkey, pork and mixed peppers. What gives this broth its characteristic flavor is the black paste's condiments and spicy pepper. What gives it a characteristic flavor is the spicy and spicy black pasta that is used to season the broth.  The purchase includes additional material downloadable from my official website, get in touch via twitter @davidchanvargas to validate your purchase.
